DataSourcePortable.Name: Resumo
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT A.HANDLE, A.NATUREZA, @CONCATENAR(@CONCATENAR(B.ESTRUTURA,' - '), B.NOME) CONTA, C.NOME HISTORICO, A.COMPLEMENTO
FROM CT_LANCAMENTOS A
JOIN CT_CONTAS B ON (B.HANDLE = A.CONTA) JOIN CT_HISTORICOSPADROES C ON (C.HANDLE = A.HISTORICO)" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="HANDLE" From="A" Path="HANDLE" /> <Field Alias="NATUREZA" From="A" Path="NATUREZA" /> <Field Alias="CONTA" From="A" Path="CONTA" /> <Field Alias="HISTORICO" From="A" Path="HISTORICO" /> <Field Alias="COMPLEMENTO" From="A" Path="COMPLEMENTO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
